data.paramJson: {"aspectRatio":"9:16","enableFallback":false,"enableTranslation":true,"model":"veo3_fast","prompt":"\"{\\n  \\\"prompt_name\\\": \\\"Porsche: Born from Lightning\\\",\\n  \\\"version\\\": 1.0,\\n  \\\"target_ai_model\\\": \\\"V3 or similar text-to-video AI\\\",\\n  \\\"core_concept\\\": \\\"Atop a storm-lashed mountain, thunder and lightning converge to forge the essence of speed and precision, summoning a Porsche 911 Turbo S from the heart of a tempest.\\\",\\n  \\\"details\\\": {\\n    \\\"scene_environment\\\": {\\n      \\\"setting\\\": \\\"A dramatic, windswept mountain peak shrouded in storm clouds. Flashes of lightning illuminate the jagged cliffs; dense clouds swirl below.\\\",\\n      \\\"features\\\": \\\"Slick, glistening rocks from recent rain. Thunderstorms rage overhead. A gnarled, ancient tree stands silhouetted against the electric sky.\\\",\\n      \\\"mood\\\": \\\"Mythical, electric, powerful, majestic.\\\"\\n    },\\n    \\\"action_sequence\\\": [\\n      {\\n        \\\"step\\\": 1,\\n        \\\"description\\\": \\\"Opening Shot: The camera ascends through swirling clouds, revealing the mountain summit as a violent thunderstorm erupts. A bolt of lightning strikes the peak, illuminating an ancient, rune-inscribed stone Porsche crest.\\\"\\n      },\\n      {\\n        \\\"step\\\": 2,\\n        \\\"description\\\": \\\"Main Action: Repeated bolts of lightning strike the crest, which begins to pulse and glow with electric energy. Currents of electricity twist through the air and swirl around the crest, drawing metal fragments and droplets of rain upward.\\\"\\n      },\\n      {\\n        \\\"step\\\": 3,\\n        \\\"description\\\": \\\"Forging: In a vortex of light and wind, the electrified air and metallic particles spiral together, forming the unmistakable silhouette of a Porsche 911 Turbo S. The Porsche badge materializes, crackling with lightning, followed by the carâ€™s contours solidifying from shimmering light into pristine paintwork.\\\"\\n      },\\n      {\\n        \\\"step\\\": 4,\\n        \\\"description\\\": \\\"The Descent: The newly forged carâ€™s headlights flare to life. It surges forward, tires skimming wet rock, then accelerates down the mountain in electrifying speed. The camera swoops beside it as it weaves between flashes of lightning, finally gliding onto a rain-slick overlook above a vast, glowing valley at dawn.\\\"\\n      }\\n    ],\\n    \\\"visual_style\\\": {\\n      \\\"aesthetic\\\": \\\"Cinematic, hyper-realistic, dramatic, mythic.\\\",\\n      \\\"resolution\\\": \\\"8K\\\",\\n      \\\"lighting\\\": \\\"Dark, stormy atmosphere illuminated by dynamic, vivid lightning. As dawn begins, soft golden hues accentuate the carâ€™s curves, raindrops sparkling on the surface.\\\"\\n    },\\n    \\\"camera_work\\\": {\\n      \\\"movement\\\": \\\"Begin with a sweeping climb through storm clouds. Circle the ancient crest as itâ€™s electrified. Spin with the swirling vortex as the car forms, then switch to high-speed tracking shots as the car descends. End with a low, wide shot of the Porsche on the overlook, poised and commanding above the world.\\\"\\n    }\\n  },\\n  \\\"negative_prompt\\\": \\\"Things to avoid: cartoon lightning, daytime, modern buildings, people, other vehicles, generic roads. Mood must remain mythic, focusing on elemental power and Porscheâ€™s iconic identity.\\\",\\n  \\\"final_text_prompt_for_ai\\\": \\\"Cinematic 8K video, hyper-realistic, mythic aesthetic. A storm-lashed mountain peak is enveloped in swirling clouds and violent lightning. Electric bolts converge on an ancient Porsche crest, forging a Porsche 911 Turbo S from crackling energy and swirling metallic particles. The car surges into life, racing down wet rocks and illuminated by lightning, then pauses on a rain-drenched overlook at dawn. A fusion of elemental power and German engineering mastery.\\\"\\n}\"","translatedPrompt":"Cinematic 8K video, hyper-realistic, mythic aesthetic. A storm-lashed mountain peak is enveloped in swirling clouds and violent lightning. Electric bolts converge on an ancient Porsche crest, forging a Porsche 911 Turbo S from crackling energy and swirling metallic particles. The car surges into life, racing down wet rocks and illuminated by lightning, then pauses on a rain-drenched overlook at dawn. A fusion of elemental power and German engineering mastery. Things to avoid: cartoon lightning, daytime, modern buildings, people, other vehicles, generic roads. Mood must remain mythic, focusing on elemental power and Porsche's iconic identity. Atop a storm-lashed mountain, thunder and lightning converge to forge the essence of speed and precision, summoning a Porsche 911 Turbo S from the heart of a tempest. {\"scene_environment\":{\"features\":\"Slick, glistening rocks from recent rain. Thunderstorms rage overhead. A gnarled, ancient tree stands silhouetted against the electric sky.\",\"mood\":\"Mythical, electric, powerful, majestic.\",\"setting\":\"A dramatic, windswept mountain peak shrouded in storm clouds. Flashes of lightning illuminate the jagged cliffs; dense clouds swirl below.\"},\"camera_work\":{\"movement\":\"Begin with a sweeping climb through storm clouds. Circle the ancient crest as it's electrified. Spin with the swirling vortex as the car forms, then switch to high-speed tracking shots as the car descends. End with a low, wide shot of the Porsche on the overlook, poised and commanding above the world.\"},\"action_sequence\":[{\"description\":\"Opening Shot: The camera ascends through swirling clouds, revealing the mountain summit as a violent thunderstorm erupts. A bolt of lightning strikes the peak, illuminating an ancient, rune-inscribed stone Porsche crest.\",\"step\":1},{\"description\":\"Main Action: Repeated bolts of lightning strike the crest, which begins to pulse and glow with electric energy. Currents of electricity twist through the air and swirl around the crest, drawing metal fragments and droplets of rain upward.\",\"step\":2},{\"description\":\"Forging: In a vortex of light and wind, the electrified air and metallic particles spiral together, forming the unmistakable silhouette of a Porsche 911 Turbo S. The Porsche badge materializes, crackling with lightning, followed by the car's contours solidifying from shimmering light into pristine paintwork.\",\"step\":3},{\"description\":\"The Descent: The newly forged car's headlights flare to life. It surges forward, tires skimming wet rock, then accelerates down the mountain in electrifying speed. The camera swoops beside it as it weaves between flashes of lightning, finally gliding onto a rain-slick overlook above a vast, glowing valley at dawn.\",\"step\":4}],\"visual_style\":{\"aesthetic\":\"Cinematic, hyper-realistic, dramatic, mythic.\",\"lighting\":\"Dark, stormy atmosphere illuminated by dynamic, vivid lightning.
